casebody.data:
NELSON
v.
NELSON. No. 508A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 13, 2006. Adrienne E. Allison, Richard B. Hager, Sanford, for Carrie Nelson. Jonathan Silverman, Sanford, for Estate of Melvin Nelson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Carrie Nelson) shall have up to and including the 16th day of November 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of October 2006."
